description: [QakBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0650) has spread through emails with malicious attachments.(Citation: Trend Micro Qakbot May 2020)(Citation: Kroll Qakbot June 2020)(Citation: Trend Micro Qakbot December 2020)(Citation: Cyberint Qakbot May 2021)(Citation: ATT QakBot April 2021)(Citation: Kaspersky QakBot September 2021)(Citation: Group IB Ransomware September 2020)(Citation: Deep Instinct Black Basta August 2022)(Citation: Microsoft Ransomware as a Service)
